title: Turing Complete
alt: Thanks to the ForcedEntry exploit, your company's entire tech stack can now be hosted out of a PDF you texted to someone.
transcript:
[Ponytail and Cueball are standing next to each other]
Ponytail:...Now, it turns out this is actually Turing-Complete...[Caption below the panel:]
This phrase either means someone spent six months getting their dishwasher to play Mario or you are under attack by a nation-state.
